    Graphvisualx
    Fichero Graphvisualx.java
    GraphViz
    Purpose: GraphViz Java API Description: With this Java class you can simply call dot from your Java programs Example usage: GraphViz gv = new GraphViz(); gv.addln(gv.start_graph()); gv.addln("A -> B;"); gv.addln("A -> C;"); gv.addln(gv.end_graph()); System.out.println(gv.getDotSource()); String type = "gif"; File out = new File("out." + type); // out.gif in this example gv.writeGraphToFile( gv.getGraph( gv.getDotSource(), type ), out );
